lead_paragraph: The resignation of Lisa S. Coico has created a leadership vacuum at the university amid two investigations, with a third looming.

headline.print_headline: Trepidation and Outrage at City College in Wake of President’s Abrupt Exit
headline.main: Trepidation at City College in Wake of President’s Abrupt Exit

snippet: The resignation of Lisa S. Coico has created a leadership vacuum at the university amid two investigations, with a third looming....
abstract: Students and faculty at City College of New York express trepidation and anger in wake of resignation by school's president, Lisa S Coico, who is being investigated for her administration's handling of more than $150,000 of her personal expenses; Coico's exit leaves leadership vacuum, but board of trustees will vote on interim president and then mount search for permanent replacement.
